EmailTemplate.name: Auto Generated Notification On Re-Assign Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Automated Follow-up From Re-Assigned Case {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Waiver Case Created
Dear {!NullValue(Contact.FirstName, "")} {!NullValue(Contact.LastName, "")},
Thank you for contacting Anthem. Your revised Case Number is {!Case.CaseNumber} and has been assigned to a representative. If you have additional details to provide, please wait until a representative contacts you and then respond to their communication For your reference, your Inquiry Case Number is {!Case.CaseNumber} .
Thank You, Anthem
